channel.title: Donator || "Player online"
channel.description:
Hello i got 2 questions
1. How can i make customs crowns? and make them work 2. I has seen one server there they was saying ect: test is online or test is offline.
Happy for answers
-Meele

item.description:
@gamerbug wrote:

one idea… copy everything in the server… make a new one… and put that in there… see if it works…

item.title: Donator || "Player online"
item.dc:creator: @bobbie1990 bobbie1990
item.description:
@bobbie1990 wrote:

[quote=“undertaxxx, post:2, topic:285900”]1. You’ll have to make a modified version of the client itself, you cannot change crowns in your server…

  1. i dont really get your point… do you mean npc saying how many people there are online? or if the admin is online etc?

And btw what source?

BE SPECIFIC IN THE FUTURE.[/quote]

Like the NPC say ect: Admin Test is Online or Admin Test in Offline

i saw it in skullscape source.

and can u tell more about donator crown?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2009, 11:08:14 am[/size][hr]no one?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2009, 11:24:01 am[/size][hr]can somthing like this work?

if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) // this is the time delay
{
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“mele”)) {
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Owner meele is ONLINE”;
} else {
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Owner Meele is OFFLINE”;
}
}
}

Read full topic
